author: igv4321
body:
The concept of "effective pedestals" (which take into account the SiPM dark current) is not applicable to QIE8 channels. This fix ensures that QIE8 channels are processed using standard pedestals, no matter what "saveEffectivePedestal" configuration parameter of HBHEPhase1Reconstructor is set to.

This PR is not supposed to modify any relval results.
title: Fix effective pedestals logic (ignore such peds for QIE8)
